#!/bin/bash
pip install python-daemon==2.1.2
git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/host-key-tools.git /root/host-key-tools
 cd /root/host-key-tools/hostkey-py/
 python setup.py install
 cp /root/host-key-tools/ch-host-key-tools.service /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service
 sed -i 's/ExecStart=.*/ExecStart=\/usr\/bin\/hostkeyd start -c https:\/\/18.221.238.74:8111\/ -s WORKFLOW -r WORKFLOWread -w WORKFLOWwrite -i NODENAME.novalocal/g' /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service
 systemctl enable host-key-tools.service 
 service host-key-tools.service start
ip route add 10.7.5.0/24 via IPADDR
ip route add SUBNET via IPADDR
wget http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/worker.sh -O /root/worker.sh
sed -i 's/NETWORK_INTERFACE=/NETWORK_INTERFACE=REPLACEIP/g' /root/worker.sh
sed -i 's/storage/STORAGENODE/g' /root/worker.sh
sh /root/worker.sh
